item.title: The Odyssey’s Cast Is Incredible But Is Missing 1 Christopher Nolan Actor Who Would Be Perfect For It
item.description: Christopher Nolan has announced what his next big movie will be, and one of his frequent collaborators would be a great fit for the project.

item.title: 15 Upcoming Horror Books Coming Out In 2025
item.description: There are many exciting horror books to look forward to in 2025, including a new release from Stephen King and Joe Hill’s first book in years.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025: 8 Biggest Snubs & Surprises
item.description: The 82nd Golden Globe Awards held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on January 5, 2025, had several major surprises and a few clear snubs.
